flawed_nl_solution:
In the first bag the proportion that pops is 8 because 60 / 75 = <<60/75=8>>8
In the second bag the proportion that pops is 0.84 because 42 / 50 = <<42/50=0.84>>0.84
In the third bag the proportion that pops is 0.82 because 82 / 100 = <<82/100=0.82>>0.82
The proportions totals 9.66 because 8 + 0.84 + 0.82 = <<8+0.84+0.82=9.66>>9.66
The average proportion is 3.22 because 9.66 / 3 = <<9.66/3=3.22>>3.22
The average percentage is 322 because 3.22 x 100 = <<3.22*100=322>>322
#### 322
